description: This file is a shell script used for setting up GRE tunnels, configuring network interfaces, and managing system events for a hotspot device. It defines variables, functions for creating GRE tunnels, initializing system events, and updating firewall rules, and includes a command case for executing setup routines.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events related to snooper functionality by enabling circuit and remote snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves configuration parameters from PSM database necessary for tunnel and network setup.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Sets up GRE tunneling interfaces, configures bridge interfaces, and associates network interfaces for hotspot connectivity.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events related to keep-alive and primary/secondary endpoint parameters for hotspot connections.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures firewall rules for traffic forwarding and filtering using iptables.
